content: = 9 sts repeat 54 sts round 21 1 half_double_crochet st in each st around 54 sts blo round 22 1 double_crochet in the first 2 sts 1 half_double_crochet in the next 2 sts = 4 sts repeat = 52 sts 1 double_crochet in the next 2 sts 54 sts round 23 1 half_double_crochet st in each st around 54 sts blo round 24 1 half_double_crochet in the first 7 sts 2 double_crochet decrease in the next st = 8 sts repeat 48 sts round 25 1 half_double_crochet st in each st around 48 sts blo round 26 1 double_crochet in the first 2 sts 1 half_double_crochet in the next 2 sts = 4 sts repeat 48 sts round 27 1 half_double_crochet st in each st around 48 sts blo round 28 1 half_double_crochet in the first 6 sts 2 double_crochet decrease in the next st = 7 sts repeat 42 sts round 29 1 half_double_crochet st in each st around 42 sts blo round 30 1 double_crochet in the first 2 sts 1 half_double_crochet in the next 2 sts = 4 sts repeat = 40 sts 1 double_crochet in the next 2 sts 42 sts round 31 1 half_double_crochet st in each st around 42 sts blo round 32 1 half_double_crochet in the first 5 sts 2 double_crochet decrease in the next st = 6 sts repeat 36 sts round 33 1 half_double_crochet st in each st around 36 sts blo round 34 1 half_double_crochet in first 4 sts 2 double_crochet decrease in next st = 5 st repeat 30 sts round 35 1 half_double_crochet in each st around 30 st blo round 36 1 half_double_crochet in the first 3 sts 2 double_crochet decrease in the next st = 4 sts repeat 24 sts round 37 1 half_double_crochet sts in each st around 24 sts blo round 38 1 half_double_crochet in the first 2 sts 2 double_crochet decrease in the next st = 3 sts repeat 18 sts round 39 1 half_double_crochet sts in each st around 18 sts blo round 40 1 half_double_crochet in the first st 2 double_crochet decrease in the next st = 2 sts repeat 12 sts round 41 2 double_crochet decrease in the next 6 sts 6 sts round 42 1 slp st in the next 3 sts *finish adding your stuffing before closing off you may use a stuffing tool to push it through the narrow opening and to direct it towards hard- to-reach areas round 43 cut end leaving a long tail for sewing pull yarn through and sew in the end to close off hanging loop this part of the pattern will be crocheted in row row 1 create a slip knot be sure to leave a long tale for sewing then chain 5 this will be your foundation chain single_crochet in the second stitch from hook followed by single_crochet sts in the next 3 sts chain 1 turn row 2- row 29 single_crochet in the next 4 sts chain 1
